name: The Company.
description:
The Company is a full-service strategic marketing firm based in Houston, Texas. 
We provide research and insight from product development through the entire marketing process, including reporting, analytics, and optimization. 
We have great creative and exceptional production capabilities, be it broadcast, print, environmental, or digital, are at the core of our output. Our marketing is scored on its ability to drive traffic/revenue as well as its ability develop a strong brand.
